chatbot¶

This is a chatbot Game of Thrones.

window¶

This is the GUI of the chatbot.

source.window.selectModeBox()¶

Display a window in order to select between One line mode and Multi line mode. Returns 0 ( = one line mode) or 1 ( = Multi line mode). :rtype: int or None

reply¶

source.reply.reply(mode, query, ontology)¶

If the query is right according to the mode, this function looks for an answer in the ontology. :param mode: 0 ( = one line mode) or 1 ( = Multi line mode) :param query: the query to ask to the chatbot :param ontology: the ontology :type mode: int :type query: str !type ontology: owlready2.namespace.Ontology :return: the answer of the query :rtype: str
